org.fhnw.aigs.server.gui

Class SettingsWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • org.fhnw.aigs.server.gui.SettingsWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class SettingsWindow
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    This class represents a window to manage the server settings. These settings will be stored in ServerConfiguration.instance
    v1.0 Initial release
    v1.1 Functional changes (added fields / removed fields)
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Raphael Stoeckli (24.02.2015)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • saveSettings

        private void saveSettings(boolean validate)
        Method stores the settings to ServerConfiguration.instance
        Parameters:
        validate - In tru, the values will be validated firstly. If an illegal value ocurred, the storing process will be aborted
